%% LyX 2.0.0 created this file.  For more info, see http://www.lyx.org/.
%% Do not edit unless you really know what you are doing.
\documentclass[english]{beamer}
\renewcommand{\familydefault}{\sfdefault}
\usepackage[T1]{fontenc}
\usepackage[latin9]{inputenc}
\setcounter{secnumdepth}{3}
\setcounter{tocdepth}{3}

\makeatletter

%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%% LyX specific LaTeX commands.
\providecommand{\LyX}{L\kern-.1667em\lower.25em\hbox{Y}\kern-.125emX\@}

%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%% Textclass specific LaTeX commands.
 % this default might be overridden by plain title style
 \newcommand\makebeamertitle{\frame{\maketitle}}%
 \AtBeginDocument{
   \let\origtableofcontents=\tableofcontents
   \def\tableofcontents{\@ifnextchar[{\origtableofcontents}{\gobbletableofcontents}}
   \def\gobbletableofcontents#1{\origtableofcontents}
 }
 \long\def\lyxframe#1{\@lyxframe#1\@lyxframestop}%
 \def\@lyxframe{\@ifnextchar<{\@@lyxframe}{\@@lyxframe<*>}}%
 \def\@@lyxframe<#1>{\@ifnextchar[{\@@@lyxframe<#1>}{\@@@lyxframe<#1>[]}}
 \def\@@@lyxframe<#1>[{\@ifnextchar<{\@@@@@lyxframe<#1>[}{\@@@@lyxframe<#1>[<*>][}}
 \def\@@@@@lyxframe<#1>[#2]{\@ifnextchar[{\@@@@lyxframe<#1>[#2]}{\@@@@lyxframe<#1>[#2][]}}
 \long\def\@@@@lyxframe<#1>[#2][#3]#4\@lyxframestop#5\lyxframeend{%
   \frame<#1>[#2][#3]{\frametitle{#4}#5}}
 \def\lyxframeend{} % In case there is a superfluous frame end

%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%% User specified LaTeX commands.
\usepackage{movie15}
\usetheme[height=12mm]{Rochester}
\useinnertheme{rectangles}
\usefonttheme{structurebold}
\setbeamertemplate{blocks}[rounded][shadow=true]
\setbeamercovered{transparent}
\setbeamertemplate{navigation symbols}{}



\definecolor{oxygengreen}{HTML}{00BF00}
\definecolor{oxygengray}{HTML}{686868}
\definecolor{oxygenlightgray}{HTML}{eeeeee}

\definecolor{oxygenblue}{HTML}{236EAF}
\setbeamercolor*{Title bar}{fg=white,bg=oxygenblue}
\setbeamercolor*{Location bar}{fg=oxygenorange,bg=oxygenlightgray}
\setbeamercolor*{frametitle}{parent=Title bar}
\setbeamercolor*{block title}{bg=oxygenblue,fg=white}
\setbeamercolor*{block body}{bg=oxygenlightgray,fg=oxygengray}
\setbeamercolor*{normal text}{bg=white,fg=oxygengray}
\setbeamercolor*{section in head/foot}{bg=oxygenblue,fg=white}
\usecolortheme[named=oxygengreen]{structure}

\makeatother

\usepackage{babel}
\begin{document}

\title{\LyX{} - Embed movies in PDF}


\subtitle{using latex-beamer and movie15}

\makebeamertitle

\lyxframeend{}\lyxframe{Big Buck Bunny}

\noindent \begin{center}
{\small \begin{figure}[ht] 
\includemovie[poster,text={\includegraphics[width=8cm, height=6cm]{/home/antonio/Documentos/movie15/bbb-splash-thumb.png}},autoplay,mouse=true]{8cm}{6cm}
{/home/antonio/Documentos/movie15/vvv.mpeg}
\end{figure}}
\par\end{center}{\small \par}


\lyxframeend{}
\end{document}
